attributes.review: This app is slow and glitches nonstop. It doesn’t provide any good information. Don’t get this app.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app greatly offended me. It makes me think that we need to build a wall around it.
attributes.title: Yuuuuge disappointment

attributes.review: 😭😭😭 I opened this app and all of a sudden Cheeto dust came out and said “hi Georgie!” and started laughing like crazy 😭Cheeto dust seriously scared the crap out of me and my dog 🥺  I don’t recommend it guys!!!

I don’t approve of pedos 
also I got creepy vibes
I feel that if I were to gaze at this app again
I’d be lost in an endless void of stupidity
Isn’t worth the struggle man 😔
attributes.title: PEDO ALERT

attributes.review: This app asked my 13 year old daughter if she would like to date a 70+ year old... why is this app legal...
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Sally my pet salamander said this app is complete doodoo even worse than the off brand of Five Nights at Freddys
attributes.title: My pet salamander type this not me

attributes.review: Made my phone very slow and glitchy
attributes.title: Two thumbs down. Bigly horrible. Sad.

attributes.review:

attributes.title: I don’t like it and that’s on period 💅🏽

attributes.review: This is the worst app i’ve ever used. It’s so laggy and glitchy. It’s terrible. Also the title is horrifying. Having a slur (Tr*mp) as the title is not good. This app literally kidnapped my mom and dog.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: My horse downloaded this app and his Hay didn’t even come in the mail, my burger was cold fries were green.... it was just Sooo terrible don’t download!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE
